General.Name: Jasuindo Tiga Perkasa Tbk
General.Description: PT Jasuindo Tiga Perkasa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the printing industry in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Security Products and Non-Security Products. The company offers payment products, including checks, bank cards, and other payment products; brand protection products comprising stamp duty and labels; commercial printing products, such as promo plus, game plus, pin mailers, reel printing, insurance policy, bills, and delivery orders; and identity documents consisting of passports, identity cards, and certificate/diploma documents. It also provides information technology solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Sidoarjo, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Betro No. 21, Sidoarjo, Indonesia, 61253
